summary: Browser-based multi-game project with HUD elements. User wants fullscreen mode.

existing_features.title: Add a fullscreen toggle button to the GamePlayPage toolbar that expands the game container to fill the entire browser viewport using the Fullscreen API (document.documentElement.requestFullscreen). The button should show an 'Enter Fullscreen' icon when not in fullscreen and an 'Exit Fullscreen' icon when active. Listen to the 'fullscreenchange' event to keep button state in sync.
When in fullscreen mode, hide the Header and Footer components so only the game content is visible. The game canvas and HUD should stretch to use the full available screen space.

new_feature_requests.summary: Make the game(s) display in fullscreen mode
